vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συστοιχ-έω,
stand in the same rank or line, of soldiers, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__2 correspond to, τὸ Σινᾶ ὄρος.. σ. τῇ νῦν Ἱερουσαλήμ [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: primarily to be in the same row with; metaphorically to correspond to, Gal. 4:25*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: corresponder a, ser una figura de
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 士兵站在同一排
1a) 呼應, 對應 (加 4:25)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 士兵站在同一排
1a) 呼应, 对应 (加 4:25)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đứng hoặc đi trong cùng một hàng; trả lời; xứng. σύν (G4862) + στοιχέω (G4748)
